headline: Ford, Energy Recovery, Kimball Electronics, Trex, and Valmont Stocks Trade Down, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after markets faded the Nvidia rally in the morning session, as investors remained uncertain about future rate cuts.

headline: Second Large Fire at Ford Aluminum Supplier Threatens Production
summary: A second large fire broke out Thursday morning at a key aluminum supplier to Ford.  All workers were evacuated from the Oswego, N.Y., plant, Novelis said in a statement.  Thursday’s fire at the about 1.5-million-square-foot plant started in a section with the rolling mill, where slabs of aluminum are heated and flattened into long, thin sheets that undergo further processing elsewhere at the plant.

raw.headline: Second Large Fire at Ford Aluminum Supplier Threatens Production

headline: Nasdaq Composite falls as Nvidia gives up gains, bitcoin slides
summary: Josh Lipton takes a closer look at three of the top stories on Wall Street. The Nasdaq Composite (^IXIC) is falling, reversing earlier gains, fueled by Nvidia (NVDA). Ford (F) is reportedly facing another fire at a key aluminum supplier, according to The Wall Street Journal. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) extends its recent declines, falling to its lowest point since April. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Another fire breaks out at a key Ford aluminum supplier
summary: A second fire in two months broke out Thursday at Novelis aluminum plant in New York. The plant supplies aluminum for Ford trucks and SUVs.

raw.headline: Another fire breaks out at a key Ford aluminum supplier
raw.summary: A second fire in two months broke out Thursday at Novelis aluminum plant in New York. The plant supplies aluminum for Ford trucks and SUVs.

headline: Second Fire at Ford Aluminum Supplier Threatens Production
summary: A second fire broke out Thursday morning at a key aluminum supplier to Ford and other automakers.  All workers were evacuated from the Oswego, N.Y., plant, Novelis said in a statement.  County fire officials said multiple fire departments remained on the scene late Thursday morning.

raw.headline: Second Fire at Ford Aluminum Supplier Threatens Production
raw.summary: A second fire broke out Thursday morning at a key aluminum supplier to Ford and other automakers.  All workers were evacuated from the Oswego, N.Y., plant, Novelis said in a statement.  County fire officials said multiple fire departments remained on the scene late Thursday morning.

headline: EQORE Raises $1.7 Million to Tackle Soaring Electricity Costs with Distributed Battery Energy Storage
summary: BOSTON, November 20, 2025--EQORE, a behind-the-meter (BTM) battery startup, raises $1.7M from MassCEC & others to cut electricity costs of industrial facilities in New England.

raw.headline: EQORE Raises $1.7 Million to Tackle Soaring Electricity Costs with Distributed Battery Energy Storage
raw.summary: BOSTON, November 20, 2025--EQORE, a behind-the-meter (BTM) battery startup, raises $1.7M from MassCEC & others to cut electricity costs of industrial facilities in New England.

headline: ECD Autodesign’s Latest Overhauled Defender 110 is a Nod to the Original Camel Trophy Vehicles
summary: KISSIMMEE, Fla., Nov. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECD Automotive Design, the world’s largest Land Rover and Jaguar restoration company known for its custom luxury builds, including bespoke Defenders, Range Rovers, Jaguar E-Types, Ford Mustangs and Toyota FJs, today announced the launch of its latest bespoke build, Project Camel Trophy, a full-frame restoration and reinvention of a client-owned Defender 110. headline: Hyundai showcases off-road ambitions with new rugged concept SUV
summary: Hyundai has ambitions to increase the off-road capabilities of its vehicles in the U.S., based on a new "Crater" SUV concept revealed Thursday by the automaker.
